languages.text: "И тебе это совсем никого не напоминает, Иокаста?" {n}Этот мужчина влюблен в огонь — слова его будто полны кусачего пламени, и сам он слишком любит играть с огнем. Они вновь пререкаются. Их взаимная неприязнь может сорвать охоту.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Ну ты же считаешь, что увесистая дубина блюстителя — дарует".
{n}Пламенное сердце Энриха может растопить лед любой души, но только не Стальной леди. Они вновь пререкаются. Их взаимная неприязнь может сорвать охоту. Спугнуть Немезита. Нужно это пресечь.{/n}

languages.text: "Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}This man is enamoured with fire. Even his words sound full of biting flames, and he himself enjoys playing with fire — too much so. They bicker again. Their mutual animosity may disrupt the hunt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И тебе это совсем никого не напоминает, Иокаста?" {n}Этот мужчина влюблен в огонь — слова его будто полны кусачего пламени, и сам он слишком любит играть с огнем. Они вновь пререкаются. Их взаимная неприязнь может сорвать охоту.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}This man is enamoured with fire. Even his words sound full of biting flames, and he himself enjoys playing with fire — too much so. They bicker again. Their mutual animosity may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

"Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}The flaming heart of this man can melt the ice of any soul, but Steel Mistress is unmoved. They bicker again. Their mutual dislike may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

"Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}This man is enamoured with fire. Even his words sound full of biting flames, and he himself enjoys playing with fire — too much so. They bicker again. Their mutual animosity may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

"Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}The flaming heart of this man can melt the ice of any soul, but Steel Mistress is unmoved. They bicker again. Their mutual dislike may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

"Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}This man is enamoured with fire. Even his words sound full of biting flames, and he himself enjoys playing with fire — too much so. They bicker again. Their mutual animosity may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

"Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}This man is enamoured with fire. Even his words sound full of biting flames, and he himself enjoys playing with fire — too much so. They bicker again. Their mutual animosity may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

"Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}This man is enamoured with fire. Even his words sound full of biting flames, and he himself enjoys playing with fire — too much so. They bicker again. Their mutual animosity may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

languages.text: "Erinnert Euch das an jemanden, Jocasta?" {n}Dieser Mann liebt das Feuer. Selbst seine Worte gleichen beißenden Flammen und er selbst genießt es, mit dem Feuer zu spielen ... etwas zu sehr. Sie zanken wieder. Ihre Feindseligkeit könnte die Jagd stören.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}This man is enamoured with fire. Even his words sound full of biting flames, and he himself enjoys playing with fire — too much so. They bicker again. Their mutual animosity may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Erinnert Euch das an jemanden, Jocasta?" {n}Dieser Mann liebt das Feuer. Selbst seine Worte gleichen beißenden Flammen und er selbst genießt es, mit dem Feuer zu spielen ... etwas zu sehr. Sie zanken wieder. Ihre Feindseligkeit könnte die Jagd stören.{/n}

"Erinnert Euch das an jemand, Jocasta?" {n}Das flammende Herz dieses Mannes kann das Eis einer jeden Seele schmelzen, doch Stahlherrin ist ungerührt. Sie zanken wieder. Ihre gegenseitige Feindseligkeit könnte die Jagd stören.{/n}

languages.text: «¿No le recuerda esto a alguien, Jocasta?». {n}Este hombre está enamorado del fuego. Incluso sus palabras queman como llamas. También disfruta jugando con fuego; lo disfruta demasiado. Vuelven a discutir. Su animadversión mutua puede perturbar la cacería.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}This man is enamoured with fire. Even his words sound full of biting flames, and he himself enjoys playing with fire — too much so. They bicker again. Their mutual animosity may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿No le recuerda esto a alguien, Jocasta?». {n}Este hombre está enamorado del fuego. Incluso sus palabras queman como llamas. También disfruta jugando con fuego; lo disfruta demasiado. Vuelven a discutir. Su animadversión mutua puede perturbar la cacería.{/n}

«¿No le recuerda esto a alguien, Jocasta?». {n}El corazón llameante de este hombre puede derretir el hielo de cualquier alma, pero Señora de Acero permanece impávida. Vuelven a discutir. Su animadversión mutua puede perturbar la cacería.{/n}

languages.text: 「誰かを思い出さないか、ジョカスタ？」{n}この男は炎に夢中だ。彼の言葉は燃え盛る炎を思わせ、彼自身もまた、火遊びを楽しんでいる…あまりにも楽しそうに。また口論が始まった。互いの敵意が狩りを混乱させるかもしれない{/n}
languages.original_text: "Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}This man is enamoured with fire. Even his words sound full of biting flames, and he himself enjoys playing with fire — too much so. They bicker again. Their mutual animosity may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「誰かを思い出さないか、ジョカスタ？」{n}この男は炎に夢中だ。彼の言葉は燃え盛る炎を思わせ、彼自身もまた、火遊びを楽しんでいる…あまりにも楽しそうに。また口論が始まった。互いの敵意が狩りを混乱させるかもしれない{/n}
「誰かを思い出さないか、ジョカスタ？」{n}この男の燃える心臓は、あらゆる魂の氷を解かすが、鉄の淑女は微動だにしない。そして、また口論が始まる。お互いの敵意が狩りを妨げてしまうかもしれない。{/n}

languages.text: “她是让你想起什么人了吗，约卡斯塔？”{n}这个人迷恋着火焰，就连他的话语听起来都带着灼热的火花。他是个喜欢玩火的人，或许有朝一日会惹火烧身。他们又开始争吵起来，他们之间的敌意可能会破坏这场狩猎。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}This man is enamoured with fire. Even his words sound full of biting flames, and he himself enjoys playing with fire — too much so. They bicker again. Their mutual animosity may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “她是让你想起什么人了吗，约卡斯塔？”{n}这个人迷恋着火焰，就连他的话语听起来都带着灼热的火花。他是个喜欢玩火的人，或许有朝一日会惹火烧身。他们又开始争吵起来，他们之间的敌意可能会破坏这场狩猎。{/n}
“她是让你想起什么人了吗，约卡斯塔？”{n}“烈焰之心”的话语可以融化灵魂中的坚冰，但“钢铁女士”却不为所动。他们又开始争吵起来，他们之间的敌意可能会破坏这场狩猎。{/n}

languages.text: « Ça ne vous rappelle rien, Jocasta ? » {n}Cet homme est fasciné par le feu. Même ses mots portent en eux la morsure des flammes, et il n'aime rien tant que jouer avec... un peu trop, d'ailleurs. Ils se chamaillent de nouveau. Cette animosité risque de perturber la chasse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Does this remind you of anyone at all, Jocasta?" {n}This man is enamoured with fire. Even his words sound full of biting flames, and he himself enjoys playing with fire — too much so. They bicker again. Their mutual animosity may disrupt the hunt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ça ne vous rappelle rien, Jocasta ? » {n}Cet homme est fasciné par le feu. Même ses mots portent en eux la morsure des flammes, et il n'aime rien tant que jouer avec... un peu trop, d'ailleurs. Ils se chamaillent de nouveau. Cette animosité risque de perturber la chasse.{/n}

« Ça ne vous rappelle rien, Jocasta ? » {n}La flamme qui anime le cœur de cet homme pourrait faire fondre les âmes les plus glaciales... et pourtant, Maîtresse d'acier reste de marbre. Ils se chamaillent de nouveau. Cette animosité risque de perturber la chasse.{/n}
